Title: Blue Harvest
Director: Dominic Polcino, James Purdum, Peter Shin
Writer: Seth MacFarlane (created by), Seth MacFarlane (developed by), David Zuckerman (developed by), Alec Sulkin
Actors: Seth MacFarlane, Alex Borstein, Seth Green, Mila Kunis
Plot: With the Griffins stuck at home during a blackout, Peter tells the story of Star Wars Episode IV: A New Hope.
